summary: When a mysterious stranger arrives in their isolated coastal town, 10-year-old twins, Kimi and Melody are forced apart. Kimi must find the strength to let go of what he loves the most.
cast: Isaac Barber|Hato Paparoa|Melanie Mayall-Nahi|McCarthy Pearse|Jim Moriarty|Richmond Patua|Nancy Brunning|Shayne Biddle|Trearjn Prangley|Sade Raukawa|Stevie Raukawa|Matthew Sunderland|Pare Paseka|Denise Proctor|Joanne Daniels|Briar Grace Smith|Charlie Dunn|Wiremu McMath|William Love|Kingi Allen|Kikorangi Marston-Te Hira|Karl Willetts|Louis Kemara|Mick Innes
title: The Strength of Water
